hero.title: Rhythm & Brews
hero.subtitle: A fun, exciting, high-quality community open mic night — all about live music.
hero.meta: Live music • Community • All ages welcome • Aguadilla, Puerto Rico

intro.paragraph1: Rhythm & Brews is a community-driven open mic night focused entirely on live music.
intro.paragraph2: Whether you're stepping on stage for the first time or you've been performing for years, this is a place to play, connect, and have a great time.
intro.paragraph3: Come to perform, come to listen, or just come to support local musicians — the energy is always better with a full room.

signup.title: Performer Sign-Up
signup.paragraph1: Sign-up happens in person only and is first come, first served.
signup.paragraph2: Slots are limited, so arrive early if you want to play.
signup.note: This is a family-friendly community event. We're here to support each other, have fun, and create a positive space for live music.

location.title: When & Where
location.paragraph1: Rhythm & Brews is hosted at The Beer Box in Aguadilla, with great drinks and a welcoming atmosphere.
location.paragraph2: Events are held occasionally, so dates may change. Follow us on Instagram for the latest updates.

instagram.title: From the Night
instagram.paragraph: Moments from past Rhythm & Brews nights — live music, good energy, and a supportive crowd.
instagram.followText: Follow @rhythmandbrewsaguadilla for updates, announcements, and photos.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.paragraph: Have a question, want to get involved, or just want more info? Send us a message — we'd love to hear from you.
